thread.title: Soon you'll be able to remap your Xbox One controller's buttons
thread.title_full: Soon you'll be able to remap your Xbox One controller's buttons

title: Soon you'll be able to remap your Xbox One controller's buttons
text:
Soon you'll be able to remap your Xbox One controller's buttons 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
Xbox One users will be able to transplant one button's function to another -- without having to stump up money for a fancy new Elite control...
